all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And God saw that the wickedness of men had become great in the earth; and every man was lifted up in the imagination of the thoughts of his heart, being only evil continually.
Moses 8:22
Quote of the Day
"Christ has organized His Church in such a way that it should be difficult to forget a soul, for each is dear to Him."
Elder William K. Jackson | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
